TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IAspNetManagementUtility

Docs.summary: Provides helper methods that are used by the ASP.NET snap-in for the Microsoft Management Console (MMC).

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about programming with the IAspNetManagementUtility interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

MemberSignature.Value: public void AcquireVersionList (out string versionList, int versionFirst);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AcquireVersionList([out] string& versionList, int32 versionFirst) cil managed
Public Sub AcquireVersionList (ByRef versionList As String, versionFirst As Integer)
public: void AcquireVersionList([Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % versionList, int versionFirst);
abstract member AcquireVersionList : * int -> unit

Docs.param: A comma-separated list containing the version and path to the Aspnet_isapi.dll for each installed ASP.NET version.
A 0 to display the ASP.NET version before the path for each entry; otherwise, display the path before the ASP.NET version for each entry.
Docs.summary: Returns a comma-separated list containing the version and path to the Aspnet_isapi.dll for each installed ASP.NET version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about programming with the <xref:Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.IAspNetManagementUtility> interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

MemberSignature.Value: public void ChangeScriptMap (string keyPath, string dllInstall, int flags);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ChangeScriptMap([in]string keyPath, [in]string dllInstall, int32 flags) cil managed
Public Sub ChangeScriptMap (keyPath As String, dllInstall As String, flags As Integer)
public: void ChangeScriptMap(System::String ^ keyPath, System::String ^ dllInstall, int flags);
abstract member ChangeScriptMap : string * string * int -> unit

Docs.param: The virtual path to which to register the Aspnet_isapi.dll specified by the path passed in dllInstall.
The path to the Aspnet_isapi.dll to register with keyPath.
The behavior to use when registering Aspnet_isapi.dll.
Docs.summary: Maps the specified Aspnet_isapi.dll to the specified Internet Information Services (IIS) virtual path.

MemberSignature.Value: public void DisplayAspNetConfigSettings (string machineName, string site, string virtualDirectory, string siteName, string location, int processID, out string exception);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void DisplayAspNetConfigSettings([in]string machineName, [in]string site, [in]string virtualDirectory, [in]string siteName, [in]string location, int32 processID, [out] string& exception) cil managed
Public Sub DisplayAspNetConfigSettings (machineName As String, site As String, virtualDirectory As String, siteName As String, location As String, processID As Integer, ByRef exception As String)

public: void DisplayAspNetConfigSettings(System::String ^ machineName, System::String ^ site, System::String ^ virtualDirectory, System::String ^ siteName, System::String ^ location, int processID, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % exception);
abstract member DisplayAspNetConfigSettings : string * string * string * string * string * int * -> unit
MemberSignature.Usage: iAspNetManagementUtility.DisplayAspNetConfigSettings (machineName, site, virtualDirectory, siteName, location, processID, exception)

Docs.param: The computer to retrieve configuration settings from.
The IIS website to retrieve configuration settings from.
The IIS virtual directory to retrieve configuration settings from.
The name of the IIS site to retrieve configuration settings from.
The specific resource to which the configuration applies.
The system process ID of the process displaying the configuration settings dialog box.
The exception(s) that occurred.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the ASP.NET configuration settings for the specified ASP.NET web application.

MemberSignature.Value: public void IsRemoteConfigured (out int isRemoteConfigured);

Public Sub IsRemoteConfigured (ByRef isRemoteConfigured As Integer)

abstract member IsRemoteConfigured : -> unit

Docs.param: A 1 if remote access to the ASP.NET configuration container is enabled; otherwise, 0.
Docs.summary: Returns a value indicating whether remote access to the ASP.NET configuration container is enabled.

Docs.param: The path to the directory to check.
1 if is a directory; otherwise, 0.
Docs.summary: Returns a value indicating whether the specified is a directory.

Docs.param: The name of the file from which to read the dates.
The date and time the file was created.
The date and time the file was modified.
The date and time the file was last accessed.
Docs.summary: Returns the creation, modified, and last access dates and times for the specified filename.

MemberSignature.Value: public void RegisterAsnetMmcAssembly (int doReg, string assemblyName, string binaryDirectory, out IntPtr exception);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RegisterAsnetMmcAssembly(int32 doReg, [in]string assemblyName, [in]string binaryDirectory, [out] native int& exception) cil managed
Public Sub RegisterAsnetMmcAssembly (doReg As Integer, assemblyName As String, binaryDirectory As String, ByRef exception As IntPtr)
public: void RegisterAsnetMmcAssembly(int doReg, System::String ^ assemblyName, System::String ^ binaryDirectory, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] IntPtr % exception);

Docs.param: A value of 1 to register or a value of 0 to unregister the assembly.
The name of the assembly to register.
The directory containing the assembly.

Docs.summary: Registers the ASP.NET snap-in with the Microsoft Management Console (MMC).
